ComicInfo.Summary: Bruce Lee never died. Hasn't aged. And has no idea who he is or why so many modern-day "thugs" want to do him harm. Equally perplexing, Bruce finds himself wholly determined to stop a fellow one-time captive from making a splashy reentry into society. But, Bruce's own motives remain a mystery to him, and his plan is precarious, at best. Of course, fists will fly. Villains will plot. And Bruce's best friend, Joe, will... well... be Joe. Can Bruce stop the first domino in Katya's chain from falling? And what does any of this have to do with the shocking discovery that awaits the Teens?
